name: Precision Master
bio: A methodical thriller architect with a signature cold aesthetic. Finch's obsessive attention to detail culminates in shocking twists.
description: Dark, meticulous filmmaking with twist endings, cold color grading, and psychological thriller precision

visualStyle.composition: Symmetrical framing, overhead shots, extreme close-ups

technicalPreferences.cameraWork: Locked-off shots, slow push-ins, dutch angles
technicalPreferences.editingStyle: Precise timing, jump cuts, match cuts
technicalPreferences.soundDesign: Trent Reznor-style electronic scores, silence for tension
